'''Deepwood Dweller's Ingenuity''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Deepwood Dweller's Ingenuity is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Brightwood = 8
|Iron Chunk = 4
|sort = Brightwood;Iron Chunk
}}
